We must reiterate the ESPN BET promo code ACTNEWS because it's required to be entered during the signup process. You won't have access to the bonus bets if you don't enter "ACTNEWS" during registration.

Using our ESPN BET Promo on Friday Sports

Neither bet works great individually for our bonus bet, but we can combine them to form a parlay. That provides us with a strong bonus bet for ESPN BET.
- Betting Pick: 76ers ATS + Lakers ATS (+290)

The Lakers have been shaky since winning the NBA In-Season Tournament, but this marks a good opportunity to turn things around against the Grizzlies.
I recommend a parlay instead of a straight bet because of the +290 odds. The
+EV betting guide suggests wagering on any market near +300 odds for a bonus bet. This ensures you're maximizing the value of a bonus, and the potential winnings are larger than the stake.
You lose the bonus bet stake no matter the outcome of your wager. Therefore, if you use a $20 bonus on this parlay, you'll either have $58.10 in winnings or nothing.
